Sentencas: The effects of sulfur poisoning on the (1 0 0), (1 1 0) and (1 1 1) surfaces of pure Ni and Cu/Ni alloy are studied in consideration of the effect of electric field.
Titulo: High resistance to sulfur poisoning of Ni with copper skin under electric field

Sentencas: The effects of Cu dopants on the S poisoning characteristics are analyzed by the means of the density functional theory results in combination with thermodynamics data using the ab initio atomistic thermodynamic method.
Titulo: High resistance to sulfur poisoning of Ni with copper skin under electric field

Sentencas: When the Cu concentration increases to 50% on the surface layer of the CulNi alloy, the (1 1 0) surface becomes the most vulnerable to the sulfur poisoning.
Titulo: High resistance to sulfur poisoning of Ni with copper skin under electric field

Sentencas: Ni with a copper skin can mostly decrease the sulfur poisoning effect.
Titulo: High resistance to sulfur poisoning of Ni with copper skin under electric field

Sentencas: Especially under the electric field of 1.0 V/angstrom, the sulfur adsorption and phase transition temperature can be further reduced.
Titulo: High resistance to sulfur poisoning of Ni with copper skin under electric field

Sentencas: We therefore propose that Ni surfaces with copper skin can be very effective to improve the resistance to sulfur poisoning of the Ni anode under high electric field.
Titulo: High resistance to sulfur poisoning of Ni with copper skin under electric field
